title: Latin Match
content:
Hi Typophiles  
Currently typesetting [a poem](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110132/http:/www.diarijejakahangat.com/2014/06/woi-melayu-gempar.html) which involves Arabic @ Latin typefaces.  
Arabic has been chosen but still begging for a latin match.  
Your help would be much appreciated.  
Regards @ Thanks
